lead_paragraph: SNELL--George B. The Partners, Counsel, associates and staff of McLaughlin & Stern, LLP sadly record the passing of our friend and retired partner, George B. Snell. George was greatly respected by his partners and warmly admired by his many clients, all of whom confidently relied on his wise counsel for decades. We send condolences to Sigrid, Dieter and Andrea and their families, and to his wide array of colleagues and friends. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SNELL, GEORGE B
